optimization_lever.description: Leverage same-rank/identical-shape fast paths in broadcast_shape
optimization_lever.rationale: Shape/reshape legality paths repeatedly merge same-rank shapes; bypassing reverse-index lookups and reverse() reduces per-call overhead while preserving merge semantics.
optimization_lever.risk_note: Optimization only changes internal shape-merge control flow; incompatibility detection and error-class outcomes remain unchanged.

isomorphism.ordering_tiebreak_note: Fast paths apply only to identical-shape and same-rank merge loops; rank-mismatch traversal, singleton expansion precedence, and incompatibility rejection classes are unchanged.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin generate_packet001_optimization_report
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_test_contract_gate -- --report-path /tmp/fnp_test_contract_gate_report_001h.json --retries 0 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_security_gate -- --report-path /tmp/fnp_security_gate_report_001h.json --retries 0 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0

rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-001/workflow_scenario_packet001_opt_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-001/workflow_scenario_packet001_opt_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-001/workflow_scenario_packet001_opt_reliability.json --retries 1 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin validate_phase2c_packet -- --packet-id FNP-P2C-001

notes: Profile report captures baseline/rebaseline latency and throughput with reproducibility command and environment fingerprint.
Isomorphism checks passed for identical-shape, same-rank merge, rank-mismatch, and incompatible-shape rejection behavior.
Optimization accepted under EV gate with score 24.0 >= 2.0 and no observed behavior drift.
Post-change workflow scenario gate rerun passed with 400/400 scenarios and coverage_ratio=1.0.
